resources.string: In-tune is a simple application which caters to all your multimedia needs in one place. It runs all sorts of audio and video files and can record the same. No ads, no restrictions, completely free, just pure experience built by skilled developers."

Features: 

Audio Recording - Record audio in high quality with the built in recorder.

Camera app - Camera shortcut for the stock phone camera.

Video Player - Plays all types of videos seamlessly with a user friendly UI.

Music Player - Play music on your phone with a simple, easy to use UI"
